Sentencas: Nano-sized BaCe0.9Y0.1O3 - delta (BCY10) protonic conductor powders were used to prepare Ni-BCY10 cermets for anode-supported intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: A wet-chemical route for the preparation of Ni-BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: A new wet-chemical route was developed starting from Ni nitrates as precursors for NiO. BCY10
Titulo: A wet-chemical route for the preparation of Ni-BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: powders were Suspended in a Ni nitrate aqueous Solution that was evaporated to allow NiO precipitation on the BCY grains, obtaining NiO-BCY10 cermets.
Titulo: A wet-chemical route for the preparation of Ni-BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: To obtain the final Ni-BCY10 anodes, pellets were reduced in dry H-2 at 700 degrees C.
Titulo: A wet-chemical route for the preparation of Ni-BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The structural and microstructural properties of the pellets were investigated using X-ray diffraction analysis and field emission scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: A wet-chemical route for the preparation of Ni-BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: A homogeneous dispersion of perovskite and nickel phases was observed.
Titulo: A wet-chemical route for the preparation of Ni-BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The chemical stability of the anodes was evaluated under wet H-2 and CO2 atmosphere at 700 degrees C.
Titulo: A wet-chemical route for the preparation of Ni-BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The electrical properties of the Ni-BCY10 pellets were evaluated using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements.
Titulo: A wet-chemical route for the preparation of Ni-BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The Ni-BCY10 cermet electrodes showed large electronic conductivity, demonstrating percolation through the Ni particles, and low area specific resistance at the BCY10 interface.
Titulo: A wet-chemical route for the preparation of Ni-BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: These characteristics make the cermet suitable for application in BCY-based protonic fuel cells.
Titulo: A wet-chemical route for the preparation of Ni-BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The developed chemical route offers a simple and low-cost procedure to obtain promising high performance anodes.
Titulo: A wet-chemical route for the preparation of Ni-BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs
